DOC.brief_title: The Effects Nutrition Supplementation Resistance Exercise During Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: On hemodialysis 3 month , thrice weekly hemodialysis program . Adequately dialyzed ( Kt/V > 1.2 ) . Age 1875 Pregnant woman . Patients unable perform exercise Severe unstable underlying disease besides commonly associate ESRD . Cardiac patient stable included . Patients hospitalize within last month prior study .
